author: James Partridge (Statement Marketing)
title: Flashbay reviewed by James Partridge (Statement Marketing)
text: Flashbay were fantastic. Christian Beaumont in particular. Quick responses to all my questions and the goods were delivered ahead of schedule. Highly recommend.
